bwwExcerpt: (Liz Keill): The show probably could have ended with "Anything Can Happen" when the entire company was on stage. But this audience was glad to see more. I could have lived without the fake barking dog, which is more of a diversion than integral to the plot, and the chimney sweeps didn't need to prance thorough the Banks house at the end of the " Step in Time" number.  Nevertheless, these are minor observations in a show that's brimming with hope, magic and humanity.
